2.「……ふむ。ここは ひとつ| <pc>に 頼むとしよう。| それでよいな スピン: ..... Here is one.<pc> I'll ask... Is that all right, Spindle?

3.「陛下の思し召しのままに……。| それでは 私は 負傷兵たちの様子を| 見てくる: As you wish, Your Majesty. Then I will go and|check on the wounded soldiers.

|hunt...

Ghazvalan's Fang's hideout is in the|southwest of western Gulen territory, in the|caves of Gregor... Please, will you take this|
|on?
